entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Severn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -30.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Severn Airport 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -30.1°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 59 %

Dewpoint: -35.6°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
